title: Learning and Memory
description: Research and applications concerning acqusition of new behavior and knowledge, including accounts based on classical and instrumental conditioning and information-processing models of memory and learning.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and PSYC 2015 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
